'''Strangers - Biome Settlers 3'''<ref name=MCNET>{{Mcnet|strangers-skin-pack-out-now|Strangers Skin Pack - Out Now!|March 9, 2017|Marsh Davies}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] themed around the inhabitants of the [[Far Lands|Farland]], [[ocean]], and [[the End|End]] biomes. At some point in 2025, the skin pack was delisted from the Marketplace in {{BE}}, though it is still available in [[Legacy Console Edition]] on some platforms. The skin pack can still be obtained on Bedrock Edtion if purchased on Legacy Console Edition.
